thread.title: Morena Baccarin MASTERFULLY Trolled ‘Deadpool’ Co-Star Ryan Reynolds For International Women’s Day
thread.title_full: Morena Baccarin MASTERFULLY Trolled ‘Deadpool’ Co-Star Ryan Reynolds For International Women’s Day

author: Douglas Charles
title: Morena Baccarin MASTERFULLY Trolled ‘Deadpool’ Co-Star Ryan Reynolds For International Women’s Day
text:
20th Century Fox

The pairing of Morena Baccarin and Ryan Reynolds in Deadpool was a stroke of genius. If there are two actors we will watch in almost anything it’s them.
Reynolds we love because of his never-ending, always hilarious sense of humor . 
Morena Baccarin we love, well, obviously because she’s gorgeous, but also because she’s talented and can also be pretty damn funny at times.
One of those times was today as she dropped a masterpiece in the trolling arts on Instagram aimed at her Deadpool co-star Ryan Reynolds.
Happy International Women's Day @vancityreynolds https://t.co/kgoov8ifU2 
— Morena Baccarin (@missmorenab) March 8, 2017 


I wonder if that’s the kind of “ sexual chemistry ” they were so happy about after Baccarin’s Deadpool screen test…

 
@missmorenab @VancityReynolds Haha. Perfect!
— Daniel McLean (@DanielJMcLean) March 8, 2017 

Indeed. 
Can’t wait to see if Reynolds decides to respond. Fingers crossed and we’ll update you here if he does.
